Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Division
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both direction via Central, division, Austin, Augusta & Central, due to police street blockage nr Central/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both direction via Central, division, Austin, Augusta then resume their normal route on Central, due to police street blockage near Central/Division.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute at Cottage Grove/56th -59th
ShortDescription: 4 Cottage Grove buses are rerouted via Cottage Grove, 55th, King Drive, 61st and Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/56th-59th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cottage Grove, 55th, King Drive, 61st, then resume their normal route on Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/56th-59th.

Allow extra travel time.
